page.title: 04A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: School starts at 8:50. We then have registration for half an hour in our form rooms. The register is taken and two times a week we have assembly in the hall. If we don't have assembly, we just sit talking quietly or some of us do our homework. At 9:20 the first lesson begins. After the first two lessons we have a break that starts at 10:40 and finishes at 11:00. We then have two more lessons and they bring us up to 12:20. Then we can either eat sandwiches that we have brought or queue up and buy chips (25p or 45p) from the fish and chip van. We then have three more lessons until 3:25 which is end of school. Lessons I do;4 x Commerce,5 x Maths 5 x English,4 x Computers,4x Geography 4x Design,4x Physics,2x Sport,1x Music 1x Career,1x Religious Eduction.
